2.label: has System code in Originating source
2.description: The name of the format used for the machine-readable record.

a.label: has Country in Originating source
a.description: The country of the issuing agency.

c.label: has Date of transaction in Originating source
c.description: Indication when a modification was made or a record was issued.

g.label: has Cataloguing rules (descriptive conventions) in Originating source
g.description: The cataloguing code used for bibliographic description and access.

h.label: has Original control number in Originating source
h.description: The original control number when a record’s Record Identifier has been overwritten.
